author: manoj
msg: Part of a fix for not being able to reset the --prefix. This will
allow the installation prefix to be reset after a "make clean". To do
this really properly, all the code that depends on the prefix should
have a dependency in the makefile. This is coming RSN.

author: martin
msg: As per suggestion of Greg Stein and Paul Gilmartin, I change the misleading
ascii_CRLF definition to what they effectively already were: a name for
the constant "\015\012", regardless of whether on a EBCDIC or ASCII based
machine. In contrast, the CRLF macro depends on the code set because it
is sent thru the EBCDIC->ASCII conversion routines.

author: dreid
msg: Rebuild the configure for MM.  Once this has settled we can remove the
configure script as it shouldn't really be there anyway.

author: bjh
msg: Add requried #include "ap_config.h" in a couple of OS/2 specific files.
